definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Xiao3 jie5 Xuan3 mei3

sentences.english: Tracy: She took her first beauty title when she's 21.
sentences.chinese: 她在21歲的時候首次摘取了“選美皇后”頭銜。

sentences.english: Some photos were of beauty queens in evening gowns or other high-status clothing.
sentences.chinese: 有些照片是身着晚禮服或者其他顯貴衣服的選美皇后。

sentences.english: Jack: When did Mrs Spink take the beauty title?
sentences.chinese: 斯賓克太太是什麼時候成爲選美皇后的呢？

sentences.english: Do you think beauty pageant contests benefit society?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲選美比賽對社會有利嗎？

sentences.english: Official media had also reported on the pageant.
sentences.chinese: 官方媒體也有關於這次選美的報道。

sentences.english: What do you think about beauty contests?
sentences.chinese: 你對選美比賽有什麼看法？

sentences.english: Could the next trophy be from a beauty pageant?
sentences.chinese: 下一座獎盃可能來自一位選美大賽冠軍嗎？

sentences.english: Others say that there’s a fine line between the pageants and sexual exploitation.
sentences.chinese: 其他人說，選美和性剝削之間只有非常細微的界線。

sentences.english: All the beauty contests are for slim girls only.
sentences.chinese: 所有的選美比賽都只爲苗條的女孩敞開大門。

sentences.english: Who made the old bailey a judge of beauty?
sentences.chinese: 是誰讓老貝勒變作了選美評判員的？

sentences.english: This is the beauty contest that could end with the judges getting an offer they can't refuse.
sentences.chinese: 這是一次連法官也盛情難卻的選美比賽。

sentences.english: The beauty pageant contestant having their catwalk training at Dazzle Concepts, the modelling company.
sentences.chinese: 選美賽的參賽者在摸特兒訓練公司進行貓步訓練。

sentences.english: She took her first beauty title when she's 21.
sentences.chinese: 她在21歲的時候首次摘取了“選美皇后”頭銜。

sentences.english: The beauty queen showboat around the stage at the end of the show.
sentences.chinese: 選美皇后們在選美會結束前繞舞臺一圈賣弄一番。

sentences.english: The beauty queen showboat around the stage at the end of the show.
sentences.chinese: 選美皇后們在選美會結束前繞舞臺一圈賣弄一番。

sentences.english: But now this beauty-pageant winner has learned to love herself.
sentences.chinese: 但現在這位選美冠軍學會了愛自己。

definition: the man (or woman) of the moment (idiom)/influential figure
Sing Tao, Hong Kong media group and publisher of Sing Tao Daily 星島日報|星岛日报
third category movie (containing sexual or violent content)
to reveal outstanding talent (idiom); to stand out as conspicuously brilliant
China, Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau (media term used esp. since 1997)
to run neck and neck/to keep pace with/to keep abreast of/on a par with one another
